response.original_title: 光来復活した大歌劇 『身毒丸』
response.overview: The much-talked-about freak show opera "Shintokumaru" was first staged by Theatre Laboratory◎Tenjou Sajiki in 1978, and in 2015 and again in March 2017, it was performed to great acclaim with the original script by ◎Banyu Inryoku. The DVD includes the music by "Caesar and the Devil's House" on CD, and the original script was performed by the original director, J.A. Seazer, to great acclaim. The stage set is overwhelming, live music is played on a wide variety of instruments, live songs cover the stage like a wall, and the actors' destructive energy is unleashed on the stage. You can fully enjoy the world of "Shintokumaru" on DVD+CD in this definitive edition!
response.title: 光来復活した大歌劇 『身毒丸』
